p: Figure 7 illustrates differentially expressed genes bi-clustering heat map of the top 30 genes sorted by adjusted p-values, between mock-infected and ZIKV-infected animals. In addition, Table 1 depicts the top 30 upregulated (in blue) and downregulated (in red) genes according to ZIKV strain and compared to mock-infected controls. Samples are grouped according to the similarities in gene expression.
